description._content: PHOTO NUMBER: VPL 7742 DESCRIPTION: Track maintenance along Alexander Street at the foot of Columbia. Chinese men work on the railway tracks. In the background boxcars are visible with the CPR depot beyond. Left of the depot the new post office and Winch Building are under construction and Spencer's department store is centre-right. Date: 1908 Photographer/Studio: Timms, Philip SUBJECTS: Streets, Railroads - Track, Horse-drawn vehicles, Horses, Chinese Canadians, Department stores, Construction, Railroads - Rolling-stock, Canadian Pacific Railway Company More information on our historical photograph collection: www.vpl.ca/historicalphotos
